meanings.sent1: The teacher explained the tanh in math class.
meanings.sent2: I used the tanh function to solve the equation.
meanings.sent3: Why did the tanh break up with the sine function? It just couldn't cosine.
meanings.sent4: Her understanding of the tanh function was as clear as a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The tanh function helps us calculate angles in triangles.

meanings.sent1: She painted her room in a lovely tanh color.
meanings.sent2: The artist mixed white and brown to create a beautiful tanh shade.
meanings.sent3: Why did the tanh refuse to play hide and seek? It couldn't hide in the brown paint can!
meanings.sent4: The tanh color of the tree bark blended perfectly with the forest.
meanings.sent5: The tanh of the wood reminded her of warm autumn days.
